reviewText: This guy is really funny with his confusing, yet simple explanations on life's biggest challenges. Truly a classic and is one of very few Cantinflas movies in color. I love it.

This is in Spanish, and I don't speak the language, but even I find this humerous.  Cantiflas is a master of comedy.  My husband has watched this movie literally hundreds of times and he still laughs out loud at it.  A rip-roaring cowboy western, with a wonderful light, comedic twist.  Excellent film.

Nice

Cantinflas always wanted to make a western movie. He filmed this one in Arizona and it is hilarious. As always the production values were great. He uses American actors in his cast. He parodies American and Mexican cultural differences, yet never with bitterness but rather with wholesome ethnic humor. This is now a lost art among modern comics. The film's video transfer is good, but English subtitles would have helped expand its audience penetration.
I loved this movie when I was growing up. there were a few audio problems with the copy I received but it over all it was a fun movie and brought back fond memories.

i prefer english movies over all but this one beats almost any. you really have to understand what he is saying as his "twist of words" is funnier than most of the movie. but his actions along with the phrases is a perfect combination

you have to be able to understand spanish in order to enjoy this movie. he talks very fast and twists words and phrases so they always have a completely different meaning than what he trying to express. very funny and a real classic. Cantinflas is the King in Mexican Movie Actors and this is his best one yet.
Big fan of Cantinflas, I had this on VHS but lost it. It made my dad happy and laugh a lot, to see this film again. There were no issues in the way it came, the picture and sound were great.
